How many people are affected by Leber congenital amaurosis ?,"Leber congenital amaurosis occurs in 2 to 3 per 100,000 newborns. It is one of the most common causes of blindness in children.",GHR,Leber congenital amaurosis
What are the genetic changes related to Leber congenital amaurosis ?,"Leber congenital amaurosis can result from mutations in at least 14 genes, all of which are necessary for normal vision. These genes play a variety of roles in the development and function of the retina.
